snippet.title: Catastronauts Release Trailer | Multi Platform
snippet.description:
Gather your friends and join the illustrious Space Fleet in this fast-paced party game! 

Can you deal with unrelenting disaster and hold your ship together long enough to destroy the enemy invaders? Repair systems, extinguish fires, arm the torpedoes, avoid deadly solar flares, destroy your friends and clone them back again; it's all in the life of a Catastronaut!

Enlist today!

Catastronauts is scheduled for release on 28th September 2018 on PS4, Xbox One and PC. The Nintendo Switch version is due to arrive very soon after!

Follow us on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Catastronauts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/catastronauts/
Website: http://www.catastronauts.co.uk
